description:
Harry is Jonah's best friend.
Don't be surprised if you see him in some upcoming clothing catalogs. Harry has been doing some stuff with some famous photographers and I was lucky enough to get a chance to work with him.
This guy is stunning in person and he's super nice as well. He had a smile on his face the whole time he was here. He's straight and has a two-year-old son who apparently is the spitting image of him.
After blowing his first load in the studio, we took him out to throw a football around. When we got back, he told me he was still horny so we did a second round — all the in the course of a few hours!
title: Harry
